content: today FMG agreed to investigate moving the IG source out of svn to GitHub, each with their own project
governance won't change - it will still be subject to HL7 procedures and processes. it's just the technical location will change to a github repository
it makes it easier for us to manage the publishing process around the IGs
we're just checking that we have enough resources to support GIT. (Makes some of us nervous)
this applies to all IGs that are balloted by HL7. We make no rules about other IGs, though the IGs may choose to use the same system if they want
this is your chance to comment on any downsides of this change from your point of view
